When one door of happiness closes, anoth:

(if (State x) (Abstract x))
(if (Event x) (Process x))
(if (and (Door x) (State y) (Event z) (happens z t) (involves z x) (hasState x y t)) (not (hasState x y (+ t 1))))

(involves OpenEvent Door2)

(hasState Door2 Open t2)
(forall (x) (not (hasState x Open t1)))
(forall (x) (not (hasState x Closed t2)))

(forall (x) (if (and (Door x) (hasState x Open t2)) (not (see x t1))))

(if (and (MentalProcess x) (prevent x y t) (change x y t) ) (cease x t1))

(change Mind OpinionChange t)
(cease Mind t1)
Life is a series of natural and spontane: This philosophical statement is not a puzzle and does not contain specific entities or events that can be translated into CLIF. It is a general statement about life and change, and does not provide a scenario with specific roles, times, or actions that can be formalized in a logical language like CLIF.
